full_text: According to estimates from the Institute of International Finance, Russia’s earnings from exports over the past three months were 65% higher than in the same period last year https://t.co/5H47rR6Wvi

localize.full_text: 国際金融研究所の推計によると、過去3ヶ月間のロシアの輸出による収益は、前年同期比65％増であった https://t.co/5H47rR6Wvi
根据国际金融研究所的估计，俄罗斯过去三个月的出口收入比去年同期高出65% https://t.co/5H47rR6Wvi
